reviews.author: Kristie Wagner
reviews.review: Unless you have perfect credit this woman(Peggy) wont even give you the time of day she is very rude and hard to get ahold of the office is hardly ever open . The one time I found the office open I went in and was asking questions and once

reviews.author: Joseph Taylor
reviews.review: The rental itself is nice, one star because anacortes property managements Peggy is a insufferably unreliable human being.

reviews.author: Brandy Ritchie
reviews.review: I was driving around Anacortes last weekend and noticed a sign for one of the rentals handled by Anacortes Property Management, checked out the listings on their website and drove by a handful of them. I sent an email on Monday morning

reviews.author: Noirceuil LeSombre
reviews.review: Good response time. Viewing unit was smooth and application process is quick. Overall - pleasant experience! Peggy is topnotch

reviews.author: SANFRAN FAN
reviews.review: Where do i start. This lady's unprofessionalism is the worst ive delt with ever. I have tried to call her multiple times with multiple left messages and refuses to call back. I have emailed her and doesnt return emails until 2-3 days later.

reviews.author: Jamezen DaVinci
reviews.review: Believe the 2.2 Rating which seems too high for the 'Snooty' Can't be Bothered to give a potential client the time & respect that anyone should expect when engaging a Business of Serving Customers & Clients! Her Clients should know that their properties sit vacant while potential renters are continuously dismissed & ignored!

reviews.author: TINA C
reviews.review: If you are looking for someone to keep up on your property, making sure it is maintained and screening renters for the best possible tenants, Peggy is the best one to do it. She is always making sure the homes she manages are in top notch

reviews.author: Cesar Guzman
reviews.review: Peggy is by far the worst. Takes her a few days to respond to emails, calls are not an option with these people and you have to work off of their schedule which is unfortunate if you work the same hours. I'd suggest she take a little more

reviews.author: Damon Anderson
reviews.review: Seriously, by far the best property management Ive ever rented from. Quick response from property manager, issues that need dealt with or handled are promptly addressed and handled. Peggy is very nice and has been nothing but a pleasure to

reviews.author: Mary Jones
reviews.review: They never answer their phones when tenants need them, no where to be found

reviews.author: Riot Ward
reviews.review: Anacortes property management is a horrible company to go through. The worst person to deal with is Peggy... trust me you'll know when you see her she is the most untrustworthy person, and once you sign up to rent a place through her place

reviews.author: Pat N
reviews.review: APM had by far the worst service I've ever experienced with any property management company. Calls and emails typically go unanswered, and it took weeks at a time for broken appliances to be replaced. They will happily cash your rent checks

reviews.author: Jimmy Buday
reviews.review: Best landlord ever. I needed something fixed it would be fixed.if I have the chance to rent from Peggy again  I would in a hart beat.I recommend Anacortes property management if your looking to rent.ive rented from Peggy for 5 years. And i would do it agin

reviews.author: Bradley Chappel
reviews.review: She wouldn't let me have my DEAD Fathers  (Rod Chappel) things from his aptmt. She never returned my calls. It's been 1&1/2 years. I'm am the Only Living Son left. She told me she was going to put his, .MY. , possessions in the garbage.

reviews.author: cole paddock
reviews.review: peggy is the absolute worst ive called and called and called and she never answered i left multiple messages and she never called back except one time looking for someone else and when i said it was me she immediately hung up the

reviews.author: Hexah Hex
reviews.review: Good luck getting that property you want. Doesn't call back and rarely responds to emails. The property you've been wanting to see or apply for will be gone before you can apply or arrange anything.

reviews.author: Katie Montigue
reviews.review: She basically never actually helped me with anything. Would not answer calls, and did not call me back. I usually had to contact the landlord for any issues. Would not recommend.

reviews.author: Kristine Stultz
reviews.review: Peggy is a wonderful, trusted property manager!  Highly recommend.

reviews.author: Araseli Bermudez
reviews.review: Never picks up the phone, been out of a washer for a month its getting really annoying

reviews.author: Kyndra Simmons
reviews.review: Peggy has been very good to our family!

reviews.author: Daniel brown
reviews.review: We have  been very pleased with APM.

reviews.author: Teresa Santos
reviews.review: Damm, never pick up the phone!!!

reviews.author: Chuck Boyd
reviews.review: Very professional.

reviews.author: Wellness Lady
reviews.review: Not impressed.
